Package com.pump.awt.text.writing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WritingFont
    A font that can be slowly rendered stroke by stroke.
    WritingTextArea
    A crude text box that displays text using a WritingFont.
    WritingTextLayout
    Analogous to a java.awt.font.TextLayout, this helps lay out glyphs in a WritingFont.
